title: Brady's Beasts
overview: A real 'Doctor Ghoulittle'â€¦ 12 year old Brady has a unique talent for communicating with monsters. He tirelessly chases after his dream of a world in which men and monsters will be able to live together in harmony. However, integrating monsters into quiet, suburban life is not easy. The adults are terrified but the kids learn to love them and the monsters become pets! Brady never gives up on searching for his own pet monster, last seen making a run for it...
